attributes.action: Please reward Captain Tom Moore with a Knighthood!
attributes.additional_details: Please reward Captain Tom Moore with a Knighthood for his brilliant contribution to our NHS in response to Covid19. As an example to us all this gentleman deserves a Knighthood!
attributes.background: Please reward Captain Tom Moore with a Knighthood for his brilliant contribution to our NHS in response to Covid19. As an example to us all this gentleman deserves a Knighthood!

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
